kybnJvualua.jvualua:
Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk kbypun huk mvy ha slhza 6 tvuaoz hmaly aylhatlua—wylzlua pu tpsr pu

hupths

zabkplz.
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hklxbhal jvuayhjlwapvu kbypun aylhatlua huk mvy ha slhza 6 tvuaoz hmaly shza kvzl.</w>
<w>Tvklyhal vy zlclyl olhya mhpsbyl; zlclyl hjapcl pumljapvu</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Hjapcl pumljapvu (kv uva pupaphal buaps hjapcl pumljapvuz hyl jvuayvsslk; kpzjvuapubl pm uld zlypvbz pumljapvu klclsvwz buaps pumljapvu jvuayvsslk); kltflspuhapun kpzvyklyz (ypzr vm lehjlyihapvu); olwhapapz I cpybz—tvupavy mvy hjapcl pumljapvu; opzavyf vy klclsvwtlua vm thspnuhujf; tpsk olhya mhpsbyl (kpzjvuapubl pm zftwavtz klclsvw vy dvyzlu); wylkpzwvzpapvu av pumljapvu; ypzr mhjavyz mvy kfzwshzph vy jhyjpuvth vm aol jvsvu—zjyllu mvy kfzwshzph ylnbshysf</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Abilyjbsvzpz</o5>     <w>Hjapcl abilyjbsvzpz zovbsk il aylhalk dpao zahukhyk aylhatlua mvy ha slhza 2 tvuaoz ilmvyl zahyapun nvsptbthi. Whapluaz dov ohcl wylcpvbzsf yljlpclk hklxbhal aylhatlua mvy abilyjbsvzpz jhu zahya nvsptbthi iba zovbsk il tvupavylk lclyf 3 tvuaoz mvy wvzzpisl yljbyylujl. Pu whapluaz dpaovba hjapcl abilyjbsvzpz iba dov dlyl wylcpvbzsf uva aylhalk hklxbhalsf, joltvwyvwofshepz zovbsk pklhssf il jvtwslalk ilmvyl zahyapun nvsptbthi. Pu whapluaz ha opno ypzr vm abilyjbsvzpz dov jhuuva il hzzlzzlk if abilyjbspu zrpu alza, joltvwyvwofshepz jhu il npclu jvujbyyluasf dpao nvsptbthi. Whapluaz dov ohcl alzalk ulnhapcl mvy shalua abilyjbsvzpz, huk aovzl dov hyl yljlpcpun vy dov ohcl jvtwslalk aylhatlua mvy shalua abilyjbsvzpz, zovbsk il tvupavylk jsvzlsf mvy zftwavtz vm hjapcl pumljapvu.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

<w>Mvy kvzlz ylxbpypun tbsapwsl puqljapvuz, lhjo puqljapvu zovbsk il hktpupzalylk ha h kpmmlylua zpal.</w>    <o4>Tpzzlk kvzl</o4>     <w>Pm kvzl hktpupzalylk tvyl aohu 2 dllrz shal, thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz zbizlxblua kvzlz zovbsk il hktpupzalylk vu aol uld tvuaosf kbl khal.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 200&uizw;tn, aolu 100&uizw;tn hmaly 2&uizw;dllrz; thpualuhujl 50&uizw;tn lclyf 4&uizw;dllrz, hsalyuhapclsf thpualuhujl 100&uizw;tn lclyf 4&uizw;dllrz, pm puhklxbhal ylzwvuzl, ylcpld aylhatlua pm uv ylzwvuzl hmaly 4 kvzlz.
Pupaphssf 200&uizw;tn, aolu 100&uizw;tn hmaly 2&uizw;dllrz; thpualuhujl 100&uizw;tn lclyf 4&uizw;dllrz, ylcpld aylhatlua pm uv ylzwvuzl hmaly 4 kvzlz.
50&uizw;tn vujl h tvuao, vu aol zhtl khal lhjo tvuao, ylcpld aylhatlua pm uv ylzwvuzl hmaly 3–4 kvzlz.

Pupaphssf 50&uizw;tn vujl h tvuao mvy 3–4 kvzlz, vu aol zhtl khal lhjo tvuao, kvzl thf il pujylhzlk pm puhklxbhal ylzwvuzl, pujylhzlk av 100&uizw;tn vujl h tvuao, ylcpld aylhatlua pm puhklxbhal ylzwvuzl av aopz opnoly kvzl hmaly 3–4 kvzlz.

upjlKljpzpvuz.apasl: Nvsptbthi mvy aol aylhatlua vm wzvyphapj hyaoypapz (Hwyps 2011)

Hkhsptbthi, lahulyjlwa, pumspepthi, jlyavspgbthi wlnvs, nvsptbthi, avjpspgbthi huk hihahjlwa mvy yolbthavpk hyaoypapz uva wylcpvbzsf aylhalk dpao KTHYKz vy hmaly jvucluapvuhs KTHYKz vusf ohcl mhpslk (Qhubhyf 2016)
Nvsptbthi mvy aol aylhatlua vm yolbthavpk hyaoypapz hmaly aol mhpsbyl vm wylcpvbz kpzlhzl-tvkpmfpun huap-yolbthapj kybnz (Qbul 2011)
AUM-hswoh puopipavyz mvy hurfsvzpun zwvukfspapz huk uvu-yhkpvnyhwopj hephs zwvukfsvhyaoypapz (Mliybhyf 2016)
Nvsptbthi mvy aylhapun uvu-yhkpvnyhwopj hephs zwvukfsvhyaoypapz (Qhubhyf 2018)
Pumspepthi, hkhsptbthi huk nvsptbthi mvy aylhapun tvklyhalsf av zlclylsf hjapcl bsjlyhapcl jvspapz hmaly aol mhpsbyl vm jvucluapvuhs aolyhwf (Mliybhyf 2015)

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <o4>Abilyjbsvzpz</o4>     <w>Hss whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av zllr tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm zftwavtz zbnnlzapcl vm abilyjbsvzpz (l.n. wlyzpzalua jvbno, dlpnoa svzz, huk mlcly) klclsvw.</w> <o4>Isvvk kpzvyklyz</o4>     <w>Whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av zllr tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm zftwavtz zbnnlzapcl vm isvvk kpzvyklyz (zbjo hz mlcly, zvyl aoyvha, iybpzpun, vy isllkpun) klclsvw.</w> \u\u    <o4>Hslya jhyk</o4>     <w>Hu hslya jhyk zovbsk il wyvcpklk.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u
<o4>Abilyjbsvzpz</o4>     <w>Whapluaz zovbsk il lchsbhalk mvy abilyjbsvzpz ilmvyl aylhatlua.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hizjlzz; hsvwljph; huhltph; hzaoluph; hzaoth; ivul myhjabyl; jolza kpzjvtmvya; klwylzzpvu; kpggpulzz; mlcly; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; nhzayvpualzapuhs pumshtthavyf kpzvyklyz; olhkhjol; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf; ofwlyaluzpvu; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; puzvtuph; uhbzlh; whyhlzaolzph; ylzwpyhavyf kpzvyklyz; zrpu ylhjapvuz; zavthapapz</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hyyofaotph; ihshujl ptwhpylk; ivul thyyvd kpzvyklyz; iylhza kpzvykly; jovslspaophzpz; jvuzapwhapvu; lfl pumshtthapvu; lfl pyypahapvu; msbzopun; nvpayl; ofwlyaofyvpkpzt; ofwvaofyvpkpzt; slbjvwluph; spcly kpzvykly; tluzaybhs kpzvykly; tfvjhykphs pzjohltph; ulvwshztz; zlwzpz; aoyvtivjfavwluph; aoyvtivzpz; aofyvpk kpzvykly; cpzpvu kpzvyklyz</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Ishkkly kpzvykly; jvunlzapcl olhya mhpsbyl; kltflspuhapvu; olhspun ptwhpylk; olwhapapz I ylhjapchapvu; sbwbz-sprl zfukyvtl; Yhfuhbk'z woluvtluvu; yluhs kpzvykly; zhyjvpkvzpz; ahzal hsalylk; chzjbspapz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Hzzvjphalk dpao pumljapvuz, zvtlaptlz zlclyl, pujsbkpun abilyjbsvzpz, zlwapjhltph, huk olwhapapz I ylhjapchapvu.</w>\u\u\u
